Audio.Locality: Boa Nova, Wet Forest, state of Bahia
Audio.Author: Jeremy Minns
Audio.Comments: Humid forest. Two males on a log. This is Call D in our DVD-ROM 'Birds of Brazil'.
Audio.BackgroundSpecies: Dysithamnus stictothorax,Drymophila squamata,Conopophaga lineata,Eleoscytalopus indigoticus,Formicarius colma,Sirystes sibilator
